purpose: Facilitates the development and deployment of agent-native applications using Dapr and Kubernetes.
principle: Builds on Dapr's distributed application runtime and Kubernetes for scalable, containerized agent-native applications.
reusability: Highly modular with support for various cloud-native technologies and APIs, enabling flexible integration and deployment.
limitations: Requires familiarity with cloud-native technologies like Kubernetes and Dapr; primarily for educational and experimental purposes.
name: learn-agentic-ai
description: Learn Agentic AI using Dapr Agentic Cloud Ascent (DACA) Design Pattern and Agent-Native Cloud Technologies: OpenAI Agents SDK, Memory, MCP, A2A, Knowledge Graphs, Dapr, Rancher Desktop, and Kubernetes.
highlight: Integrates Dapr and Kubernetes with OpenAI Agents SDK for building agent-native cloud applications.
